bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: NetworkManager-ssh not working.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.0-1.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: Always.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install NetworkManager-ssh. 2. Configure SSH-VPN connection. 3. Try to connect.
Actual results: NetworkManager[7979]: <info> [1466962674.6497] audit: op="connection-activate" uuid="402b2f59-66f4-4922-955b-25dbb07a8cb1" name="test" pid=6983 uid=1000 result="success" NetworkManager[7979]: <info> [1466962674.6691] vpn-connection[0x556a78daf210,402b2f59-66f4-4922-955b-25dbb07a8cb1,"test",0]: Started the VPN service, PID 8310 NetworkManager[7979]: <warn> [1466962679.4686] vpn-connection[0x556a78daf210,402b2f59-66f4-4922-955b-25dbb07a8cb1,"test",0]: Timed out waiting for the service to start NetworkManager[7979]: (nm-exported-object.c:930):nm_exported_object_dispose: code should not be reached
Additional info: Regression since Fedora 24.
I'm on it. I'll see what's the deal. I suspect it was built from the wrong upstream branch.

Also traffic forwarding over SSH-tunnel was broken about a couple of weeks ago. It is probably related with kernel upgrade and also affects Fedora 23. So you can manually create local and remote TUN-devices in point-to-point mode and assign IP addresses but remote IP does not answer to pings.
Client side has no issues related to kernel version. The last working kernel on server side is 4.4.9-300.fc23, later versions have problems with traffic forwarding over SSH-tunnel.
NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.1-0.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-94b9224d4c
NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.1-0.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-59e270d747
Sorry it took so long. Finally got to a place where I can have SSH access and Internet. Updates pushed to f24 and f25.

NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.1-0.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-94b9224d4c

NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.1-0.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-59e270d747
NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.1-0.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
NetworkManager-ssh-1.2.1-0.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
